Title: Requires a personal use pharmaceutical disposal system be provided at the time of dispensing a controlled substance prescription
Summary: Requires a personal use pharmaceutical disposal system be provided to the ultimate user at the time of dispensing a prescribed controlled substance; requires county health departments to provide such disposal systems at no cost to pharmacies.
LawCode: Add ยง3309-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring a personal use pharmaceutical disposal system be provided at the time of dispensing a controlled substance prescription
